metadata.title: CVE-2020-1778 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: When OTRS uses multiple backends for user authentication (with LDAP), agents are able to login even if the account is set to invalid. This issue affects OTRS; 8.0.9 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
